keyMoments.title: Inuppe Refuses to Attack Nami
keyMoments.description: Inuppe refuses to attack Nami despite orders, demonstrating that Sanji's chivalry remains intact in his shadow. He declares he would rather die than harm a lady.
keyMoments.significance: Powerfully demonstrates that shadows contain core personality traits and deeply held values, not just memories.
keyMoments.quote: I would rather die than harm a lady!

keyMoments.title: Struck Down by Absalom
keyMoments.description: Absalom strikes down Inuppe with his Shisha no Te technique for refusing to follow orders and attacking fellow zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the consequences of disobedience under Absalom's command and highlights Inuppe's commitment to Sanji's principles.

abilities.description: Inherited from Sanji's shadow, Inuppe fights exclusively with powerful kicks that can break weapons and defeat General Zombies.

relationships.description: Inuppe is animated by Sanji's stolen shadow, inheriting his chivalrous nature and fighting style.

evolutionMoments.description: Inuppe's refusal to harm Nami demonstrates the depth of Sanji's chivalry.

relationships.description: Inuppe protects Nami due to Sanji's chivalrous nature, refusing to let anyone harm her.

reveals.information: Shadows retain core personality traits and values from their original owner

keyMoments.title: Escapes from Absalom
keyMoments.description: Using the chaos caused by Inuppe's rebellion, Nami manages to escape from Absalom's clutches, avoiding another kidnapping attempt.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's resourcefulness and determination to avoid the forced wedding ceremony.

keyMoments.title: Pursued by Lola
keyMoments.description: Nami is chased out of the garden by the zombie warthog Lola, who wields a large ornate axe and sees Nami as a rival for Absalom's affections.
keyMoments.significance: Adds another layer of threat to Nami's situation on Thriller Bark.

keyMoments.title: Strikes Down Inuppe
keyMoments.description: Absalom uses his technique 'Shisha no Te' to strike down Inuppe for refusing to attack Nami, showing his ruthless control over the zombie army.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Absalom's willingness to destroy his own subordinates for disobedience.

keyMoments.title: Uses Shisha no Te
keyMoments.description: Absalom debuts his technique 'Shisha no Te' (Hand of the Dead), a powerful attack used against Inuppe.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of one of Absalom's signature combat techniques.

abilities.description: Hand of the Dead - A powerful attack technique that Absalom uses to strike down opponents.

keyMoments.title: Pursues Nami
keyMoments.description: Lola chases Nami out of the garden with a large ornate axe, seeing her as a rival for Absalom's affections.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Lola's obsession with marrying Absalom and adds comedic yet dangerous threat to Nami's situation.

keyMoments.title: Uses Chikai no Himesama Dakko
keyMoments.description: Lola debuts her technique 'Chikai no Himesama Dakko' (Oath Princess Carry), one of her Hanayome Bujutsu techniques.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Lola's unique bride-themed fighting style.

statusHistory.reason: Zombie animated with Charlotte Lola's shadow

abilities.description: Oath Princess Carry - One of Lola's Hanayome Bujutsu (Bride Martial Arts) techniques.
Bride Martial Arts - Lola's unique fighting style that combines wedding-themed attacks with zombie strength.

relationships.description: Lola is obsessed with marrying Absalom and calls him 'Ab-sama', though he finds her repulsive.

evolutionMoments.description: Lola pursues Nami as a rival for Absalom's affections.

relationships.description: The zombie is animated by Charlotte Lola's shadow, inheriting her tendency to propose to men.

keyMoments.title: Faces Tararan with Franky
keyMoments.description: Robin and Franky are confronted by Tararan, the giant spider-monkey General Zombie, and multiple General Zombies on a bridge.
keyMoments.significance: The Straw Hats encounter one of the powerful General Zombies.

keyMoments.title: Destroys the Bridge
keyMoments.description: Robin works with Franky to destroy the bridge they are standing on, creating distance from Tararan and the General Zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates tactical teamwork and strategic thinking.

keyMoments.title: Debuts Cien Fleur: Wing
keyMoments.description: Robin debuts 'Cien Fleur: Wing', sprouting one hundred arms in the shape of wings for limited flight capability.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Robin's wing technique, significantly expanding her combat abilities and mobility. Becomes one of her signature moves.

abilities.description: Hundred Flower: Wing - Robin sprouts one hundred arms in the shape of wings, granting her limited flight capability.

reveals.information: Can use her Hana Hana no Mi to create wings for flight

keyMoments.title: Battles Tararan
keyMoments.description: Franky confronts Tararan, the giant spider-monkey General Zombie, alongside Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky facing one of Thriller Bark's powerful zombie commanders.

keyMoments.title: Helps Destroy the Bridge
keyMoments.description: Franky works with Robin to destroy the bridge as a tactical move against Tararan and the General Zombies.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Franky and Robin
keyMoments.description: Tararan, the giant spider-monkey General Zombie and Spider Mice commander, confronts Franky and Robin on a bridge.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict as the Straw Hats face one of the powerful General Zombies.

abilities.description: Fires sticky webbing from his palms for both offensive and defensive purposes.

keyMoments.title: Falls from the Sky
keyMoments.description: Brook suddenly falls from the sky in a dramatic and comedic moment, landing near Franky and Robin's location.
keyMoments.significance: Marks an important moment in Brook's gradual integration with the Straw Hat crew.
